name: Praxis Communications
description:
B2B marketing require a different skill set than typical consumer strategies, especially when the offering is technically complex. Big ideas can be in the smallest details. Multiple decision makers may be involved in the final purchase. Crowded markets make it difficult to stand out. If you need a true B2B marketing agency that can really dig into this challenging and competitive environment, we can help.
Praxis Communications is a 30-something-year old Philadelphia-area B2B marketing communications firm, focusing on clients in the energy, process, capital equipment and technology fields. Our experienced team unearths leads for our clients through a fertile mix of web strategies, internet marketing and traditional marketing activities.
